Cachitos

Housed in a nineteenth century building on Rambla Catalunya, Cachitos combines tapas and drinks a large space boasting a surprising design by Estrella Salietti and Pepe López del Hoyo. Grupo Costa Este runs this new hot spot for the coolest nights in Barcelona..

The gastronomic offer of Taller de Tapas is based on a traditional high quality cuisine with signature touches. Its chef, José miguel Manzanal, fworks with seasonal local products to offer an impeccable selection of tapas.

Location: Rambla Catalunya

Dining room capacities: 90 pax

Price Level: Medium

Style: Mediterranean cuisine

Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: No
